site.title: Wood Kits - DIY Wooden Construction Kits

hero.title: Premium DIY Wooden Construction Kits
hero.subtitle: Create beautiful, functional pieces for your home and garden with our easy-to-assemble wooden kits.

raised_garden_bed.title: Raised Garden Bed Kit
raised_garden_bed.description: Complete kit for building a 4x4 raised garden bed. Includes pre-cut cedar boards and hardware.

wall_shelf.title: Wall Mounted Shelf Kit
wall_shelf.description: Stylish floating shelf kit with hidden brackets. Perfect for displaying books and decor.

garden_bench.title: Garden Bench Kit
garden_bench.description: Classic wooden bench kit for your garden or patio. Weather-resistant treated lumber.

storage_box.title: Storage Box Kit
storage_box.description: Versatile wooden storage box with hinged lid. Great for tools, toys, or outdoor cushions.

planter_box.title: Planter Box Kit
planter_box.description: Decorative planter box kit for herbs and small plants. Includes drainage system.

tool_rack.title: Tool Rack Kit
tool_rack.description: Wall-mounted tool organization system. Keep your workshop tidy and tools accessible.
